name: Top Cook
description:
Who likes party games? Who likes party games? WE DO! WE DO! WE DO! WE DO! 

Introducing TOP COOK! Where you compete with your friends to see who will reign supreme in the kitchen! In TOP COOK, you battle against the clock as you try to cook the perfect meal! With everyone taking their turn as the TOP COOK or one of his adorable COPY COOK assistants, do your best to cook the most accurate meal for maximum points! 

As TOP COOK you rule from above in your exclusive kitchen. You are entrusted with the secret recipe, which you must cook with speed and precision. 

As a COPY COOK assistant, you work from below, paying close attention to your master above with an eye towards mimicking his mighty culinary creations! 

Be the cook with the most points and leave with your honor in tact! Cooks! Sharpen your claws!
